channel.title: [718] GemCutting/ItemonItem not working
channel.description:
Hi there, I'm using this source: [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/downloads/559487-eriewin-ii-full-server-official-release.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/downloads/559487-eriewin-ii-full-server-official-release.html[/url]
Its overall a great server but I am struggling to get gem cutting to work. Everything in the class's seem fine but when I click use the chisel on the gem, or simply click craft on the gem, Any gem, It simply does nothing. I have tried all gems and all different ways of using the items on each other. Not even the Dialogue pops up where the chatbox is. Literally nothing happens at all.
InventoryOptionsHandler.java: [url=http://pastebin.com/TcB9Wbu1][Java] package com.ew.net.decoders.handlers; import java.util.List; import com.ew - Pastebin.com[/url]
GemCutting.java: [url=http://pastebin.com/ExZ099vK][Java] package com.ew.game.player.actions; import com.ew.cache.loaders.ItemDefinitio - Pastebin.com[/url]
GemcuttingD.java: [url=http://pastebin.com/9hjVhYPb][Java] package com.ew.game.player.dialogues; import com.ew.game.player.actions.GemCu - Pastebin.com[/url]
100% repping & Thanking for some assistance.
Thanks.

item.title: [718] GemCutting/ItemonItem not working
item.dc:creator: @iBucky iBucky
item.description:
@iBucky wrote:

Hi there, I’m using this source:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/downloads/559487-eriewin-ii-full-server-official-release.html

Its overall a great server but I am struggling to get gem cutting to work.
Everything in the class’s seem fine but when I click use the chisel on the gem, or simply click craft on the gem, Any gem, It simply does nothing. I have tried all gems and all different ways of using the items on each other.
Not even the Dialogue pops up where the chatbox is. Literally nothing happens at all.

InventoryOptionsHandler.java:
[Java] package com.ew.net.decoders.handlers; import java.util.List; import com.ew - Pastebin.com

GemCutting.java:
[Java] package com.ew.game.player.actions; import com.ew.cache.loaders.ItemDefinitio - Pastebin.com

GemcuttingD.java:
[Java] package com.ew.game.player.dialogues; import com.ew.game.player.actions.GemCu - Pastebin.com

100% repping & Thanking for some assistance.

Thanks.
